Set up a station

ex.landing.description.label.2:
Ninja Cash is a decentralized peer to peer (P2P) cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to trade ETH and BTC for cash. You can join us anonymously: no signup, no ID verification, no fraud
Read more about us here
ex.landing.features.label.4: Trade with other Ninjas in your area
ex.landing.tryTelegram.label: Try out the platform for FREE by joining the conversation on Telegram
product_info: Ninja is open-source, decentralized software that never holds your funds. By freely choosing to use Ninja, the user accepts sole responsibility for their behavior and agrees to abide by the legalities of their governing jurisdiction. Ninja cannot be liable for legal, monetary or psychological damages should you do something stupid. Never invest more than you are willing to lose. Play safe!

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: What ID do I need as a seller or a buyer?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: We do not need ID verification. If you verify your phone number, you will have the chance to get 1 free ETH to make transactions on Shake Ninja

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Are credit cards accepted?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: Yes. We accept Visa, Mastercard, Amex and Discover

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: What currencies can people exchange?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: We accept all types of currencies

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Is there a system to track the trading history?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: Yes. We count the successful and failed transactions with clear report for each seller and buyer

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Is there any country restricted for this platform?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: We are available for all countries

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Is there decentralized exchange?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: Yes. Therefore the transaction is 100% safe and secured

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Can I use paypal?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: We are not available on Paypal at the moment

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: Will the funds be held in Escrow?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: Yes, in either Escrow on smart contract or ethereum blockchain

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.question: How will the Smart Contract execute when physical cash is involved and there is a lag in transaction time?
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_FAQ.answer: After receiving the physical cash, the seller will click on the accept button, the coin will be automatically transferred to the buyer. The process takes about 10 minutes to 20 minutes

info.title: 1. Post your trade
info.description: Select the coin you want to buy/sell along with your desired price

info.title: 2. Choose your shop
info.description: Search and choose the most suitable shop in your location

info.title: 3. Fulfill your exchange
info.description: Meet up at the shop and exchange cash to coin or coin to cash

info.title: 4. Secure your payment
info.description: Process has been secured 100% by smart contract

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_SECOND_BOX_TITLE: We are the first to offer a completely decentralized platform to buy and sell Bitcoin and Ethereum.
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_SECOND_BOX_DESCRIPTION_: Multiple payment method: credit card and cash

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_1.title: Multiple Payment Method
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_1.description: We are available for cash - coin trading and credit card - coin trading. Find your nearest traders and leave no transaction history for any activity on our platform.

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_2.title: Fast and On the go
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_2.description: With location based trading, we allow you to make payment in few minutes with utmost convenience.

COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_3.title: 100% safe and secured for both sides
COIN_EXCHANGE_LP_THIRD_BOX_3.description: Unlike any other platform, we do not hold users' keys and grant full key controls to buyers and sellers.
